basic.floral_language:
Kalanchoe fedtschenkoi 'Rosy Dawn' 
Floriography: beautiful, tenacious, pretty
Has a pretty and beautiful shape, like butterflies, green to gray green leaves in oval shape and have toothed pink edges, leaf surface slightly covered with white powders, very easy to multiply by lateral buds emerging from the leaf edges. 
Likes half shaded environments, avoid direct strong sunlight, need shade properly under scattered light. Flowers are orange.
basic.blooming: Succulent plants, sometimes flowers, orange red flowers
basic.color: Leaf color gray green to blue green, leaf margine pink

maintenance.soil: Peat and akadama mixed in 3:1 ratio
maintenance.sunlight: Likes half shade, avoid strong sunlight, suitable in places with bright scattered light
maintenance.watering: Resistant to drought, water thoroughly when soil is dry, reduce water in summer
maintenance.fertilization: Dilute fertilizers following instructions,  apply once every 1-2 months in spring and autumn
maintenance.pruning: Remove dead and rotten part timely
